_meta.note: Estimate based on published rates as of 2026-02 — verify at pcbtrain.co.uk
pricing_notes: PCBTrain is a UK-based pooling fab; multiple customers share manufacturing panels.
No tooling charges. No minimum order charge.
VAT (20%) is NOT included in rate card prices — add at invoice stage.
HASL is NOT offered. Default finish is Immersion Silver.
Assembly is NOT available via this fab — PCB only.
Express service (PCBTrain Express): immersion silver only, no solder resist/legend, no internal routed cut-outs.

lead_times.express_notes: 8-hour turnaround for 1-2 layer; 32-hour for 4-layer. Data must be received by 09:00.

immersion_silver.label: Immersion Silver (RoHS)
immersion_silver.notes: Default and most popular. 6-month shelf life. Flat surface.

enig.label: ENIG (Electroless Nickel Immersion Gold)
enig.notes: 15% surcharge on board cost. Not available on Express service.

shipping_gbp.notes: Royal Mail untracked — use tracked carrier for orders >£100.

price_table.ref_spec: 2-layer, Immersion Silver, 1oz copper, 1.6mm FR4, standard lead time (12 days), GBP ex-VAT
price_table.interpolation_notes: For board sizes not in table: scale price linearly by area (w_mm * h_mm) relative to the nearest entry. Apply layer_multipliers, surface_finish surcharges, and express_multiplier on top.
